Summary: a huge diamond shaped object hovered about ten feet above my house.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around April 10th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking out to my car getting ready to go to scool when i saw a metallic looking diamond shaped onject stood, hovering, above my house. it was just starting to get light outside but there were lights under the object that i could see at each of the four corners. these were not ordinary lights. they had a blueish tint and they were extrememly bright.i stood there watching for three minutes or so when the object suddenly started going straight up into the air at a slow pace. it drifted directly above me and then on across my street. it was about one hundred feet off the ground now. it suddenly plunged into the ground without leaving a single trace. it only left behind a small bit of metallic object which is sitting in my garage right now. it is extrememly sturdy but very light. i would like an explanation of what this was and what this material is that is in my garage.
